questions.question: Which feature in Windows Server 2025 helps protect hardware, firmware, and the operating system from tampering and unauthorized access?

explanations.Secured-core server: Correct. Secured-core solutions help protect hardware, firmware, and the operating system from tampering and unauthorized access.
explanations.Storage replication: Incorrect. Storage replication helps with data redundancy and disaster recovery, not with hardware or firmware protection.
explanations.GPU partitioning: Incorrect. GPU partitioning is used for AI and machine learning workloads, not for hardware or firmware protection.
explanations.Hotpatching: Incorrect. Hotpatching reduces downtime by applying updates without requiring a reboot.

questions.question: What is a benefit of hybrid features in Windows Server 2025?
choices: Integration of cloud advancements into existing server environments
Limiting virtualization to only two virtual machines
Eliminating the need for on-premises infrastructure
questions.correct_choice: Integration of cloud advancements into existing server environments

explanations.Integration of cloud advancements into e: Correct. Hybrid features enable integration of cloud advancements into existing server environments, supporting adaptability and cloud-readiness.
explanations.Limiting virtualization to only two virt: Incorrect. The Datacenter edition supports unlimited virtual machines.
explanations.Eliminating the need for on-premises inf: Incorrect. Windows Server 2025 is optimized for on-premises infrastructure and hybrid setups.
explanations.Disabling remote access capabilities: Incorrect. Windows Server 2025 supports secure remote work, not disables it.

questions.question: How does Windows Server 2025 help IT teams save time and effort?
choices: By providing centralized and unified management tools
By requiring manual updates for all servers
By removing support for hybrid environments
By limiting automation of routine tasks
questions.correct_choice: By providing centralized and unified management tools

explanations.By providing centralized and unified man: Correct. Centralized and unified management tools make it easier to oversee both on-premises and hybrid environments, saving IT teams time and effort.
explanations.By requiring manual updates for all serv: Incorrect. Windows Server 2025 includes automated patching to reduce manual effort.
explanations.By removing support for hybrid environme: Incorrect. The platform supports hybrid environments to increase flexibility.
explanations.By limiting automation of routine tasks: Incorrect. Windows Server 2025 automates routine tasks to help IT administrators focus on strategic projects.

questions.question: Which capability in Windows Server 2025 supports AI and machine learning workloads?

explanations.GPU partitioning: Correct. GPU partitioning enables support for AI and machine learning workloads.
explanations.Secured-core server: Incorrect. Secured-core server is focused on security, not AI workload support.
explanations.Automated patching: Incorrect. Automated patching is for reducing downtime and improving productivity.
explanations.Role-based access controls: Incorrect. Role-based access controls are for secure remote work, not AI workloads.

questions.question: What do software-defined datacenter technologies in Windows Server 2025 improve?
